catalog_info.title: Elementary Chinese for Advanced Beginners
catalog_info.notes: Classes meet five days a week, additional discussion sections to be arranged. No auditors. May not be taken Pass/Fail. Students must pass a test in listening and speaking to take the course.
catalog_info.description: For students with significant listening and speaking background. Introductory Modern Chinese language course, with emphasis on reading and writing. Covers in one term the equivalent of Chinese Ba and Bb.
